name: Lost Minotaur
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can’t speak

actions.desc: The minotaur makes two twilight greataxe attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) slashing damage and 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Twilight Greataxe

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Gore

special_abilities.desc: If the lost minotaur moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 13 (3d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.
special_abilities.name: Charge

special_abilities.desc: The lost minotaur has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
special_abilities.name: Keen Smell

special_abilities.desc: The lost minotaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance

special_abilities.desc: The lost minotaur can magically sense the presence of living creatures within 1 mile away. It knows each creature’s general direction but not exact location.
special_abilities.name: Sense Life
